WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed. New issue raised for exception.
WorkItem.Description:

Comments.Message: Jothay mentioned in a discussion thread that you will need the current WPF Toolkit installedhttp://wpf.codeplex.com/releases/view/40535 does that help?

I guess the answer then is that I was jumping the gun since Jothay's message came out after this report (but then something is odd with the time stamps since your response also appears to precede the time of the topic in Discussion.  After installing the toolkit, the build does succeed but I get an unhandled exception when trying to run. I'll give details on that in a separate item.
